sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Incidental) Upon making an unsuccessful attack with a starship or vehicle weapon, the character may spend 2 advantage per rank of Overwhelm Defenses. Reduce the defense rating in the defense zone targeted by the attack for the remainder of the encounter by 1 for every 2 advantage spent.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Overwhelm Defenses</name> <number>TAL0001243</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-31 20:57:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e794e1c82f98e050e0f497eef699b63b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-31 20:57:04</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
